name: Bible Buffet
overview: Bible Buffet combines the best features of a board game with the fast action of a video arcade. Spin the spinner to see where you'll land. Visit exciting places like Pizza Land, Bread Land and Fruit Land. Win the game by gathering the most food for the Food Bank, finishing the map first or answering the most Bible questions correctly. Pop quizzes test your knowledge of Bible stories and characters. Every trip through Bible Buffet is a unique new adventure, giving the whole family hours of food-frolicking fun!
